title: Helmsman Planning Algorithm Implementation
details:
Successfully implemented the energy-aware daily planning algorithm for Helmsman AI-Augmented Task Management system. 

**Core Implementation (588 lines):**
- backend/src/planning/daily-planner.service.ts: Complete algorithm with weighted scoring (Priority 40%, Deadline 30%, Energy 20%, Focus 10%)
- backend/src/planning/planning.controller.ts: REST API with GET /api/plans/today endpoint
- backend/src/planning/planning.module.ts: NestJS module integration
- backend/src/planning/dto/planning.dto.ts: Comprehensive DTOs with validation
- backend/src/planning/types.ts: TypeScript interfaces for algorithm components

**Key Algorithm Features:**
- Sophisticated weighted scoring system based on research findings
- Topological sort dependency resolution with circular dependency detection using DFS traversal
- Energy-aware time slot generation (morning=HIGH, afternoon=MEDIUM, evening=LOW)
- Focus type batching for cognitive efficiency
- Greedy task assignment with optimization metrics
- Comprehensive error handling and validation

**Testing:**
- 9 comprehensive unit tests covering normal scheduling, edge cases, dependencies, circular dependencies, working hours constraints
- All tests passing with proper mocks for TasksService and PrismaService
- Code successfully compiles and builds

**API Design:**
- GET /api/plans/today endpoint with date parameter support
- DailyPlanResponseDto with scheduleBlocks, unscheduledTasks, optimization scores
- OpenAPI documentation and proper error handling

**Development Approach:**
- Followed complete-task.prompt.md workflow systematically
- Conducted comprehensive web research on scheduling algorithms, weighted scoring, dependency resolution
- Used existing NestJS patterns and Prisma schema integration
- Resolved TypeScript compilation issues related to schema mismatches
- Implemented production-ready code with comprehensive testing

**Time Tracking:**
- Estimated: 10 hours
- Actual: 4 hours (60% faster than estimated)
- High efficiency due to structured approach and comprehensive research

This implementation provides the core intelligent scheduling functionality for the Helmsman system, enabling ADHD-optimized task management with energy-aware planning.
